message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really like it. Would you like to make a deal at $150?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to pay that?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $130?

I can see you're really interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $130. I'm willing to make a small concession, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $145. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $135?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $135 and my previous offer of $145. How about we meet at $140?
I understand your need to make a profit, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $137.50?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $137.50. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. How about we meet at $142.50?

I understand you're trying to get closer to your minimum price, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $142.50 and my previous offer of $137.50. How about we meet at $140?
